properties.name: openweathermap.API
properties.description: Defines the API key that is used for retrieving the weather data from openweathermap.org.

properties.name: openweathermap.version
properties.description: Determines the current version of openweathermap.org that is in use.

properties.name: openweathermap.units
properties.description: Specifies the units openweathermap.org returns (metric or imperial).

properties.name: openweathermap.language
properties.description: Defines the language used for the weather information. For more information see https://openweathermap.org/current#multi.

properties.name: openweathermap.forecastDays
properties.description: Defines the amount of forecast days for openweathermap.org. Has to be in [1,16].
